participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Introverted and contemplative, Jordan enjoys deep thoughts and is selective about conversations.
participant_1.background: i like playing basketball. my favourite artist is travis scott. i have one older sister. my mother is a dentist. i'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Sofia is introspective and spiritual, embracing silence as a way to connect with her inner self.
participant_2.background: i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i have not spoken in three months. i live in alaska. i like meditation. i'm a buddhist.

content.text: You must be a very quiet person
I do not even talk irl
